Module fr.cyu
Package M

Class ExerciseStdinStdout

  • java.lang.Object
    • M.Exercise
      • M.ExerciseStdinStdout
  • public class ExerciseStdinStdout
extends Exercise
    Represents an exercise that uses standard input and standard output for input and output.

                           int NbTry,
                           int NbSucess,
                           int NbSessionSucess,
                           int NbFirstTry)
        Constructor for ExerciseStdinStdout.
        Parameters:
        id - the exercise ID.
        ExoType - the exercise type.
        ExoName - the exercise name.
        Instruction - the exercise instructions.
        SolutionLang - the solution language ID.
        SolutionCode - the solution code.
        GeneratorCode - the code for generating inputs.
        NbTry - the number of tries.
        NbSucess - the number of successful attempts.
        NbSessionSucess - the number of successful attempts in the current session.
        NbFirstTry - the number of successful attempts on the first try.
